name: Five Keys Charter (Schools and Programs)
description: Five Keys is an educational program that provides an opportunity for people to reach their full potential through the use of social and restorative justice principles, providing traditionally underserved communities the opportunity to improve their lives through a focus on the Five Keys: EDUCATION, EMPLOYMENT, RECOVERY, FAMILY, COMMUNITY.
